languages.text: {n}Эмелина качает головой.{/n} "Ты даже не знаешь о том, какая судьба постигла ее, верно? Думаю, тебе не помешает кое что узнать..." {n}Странный звук заставляет саванта умолкнуть. Эмелина оборачивается в сторону штольни...{/n}

{n}Emelina shakes her head.{/n} "You don't even know what fate befell her, do you? I suppose it won't hurt for you to know something of it..." {n}A strange sound causes the Sage to fall silent. She turns toward the tunnel...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Эмелина качает головой.{/n} "Ты даже не знаешь о том, какая судьба постигла ее, верно? Думаю, тебе не помешает кое что узнать..." {n}Странный звук заставляет саванта умолкнуть. Эмелина оборачивается в сторону штольни...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina shakes her head.{/n} "You don't even know what fate befell her, do you? I suppose it won't hurt for you to know something of it..." {n}A strange sound causes the Sage to fall silent. She turns toward the tunnel...{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina shakes her head.{/n} "You don't even know what fate befell her, do you? I suppose it won't hurt for you to know something of it..." {n}A strange sound causes the Sage to fall silent. She turns toward the tunnel...{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}艾米莉娜摇了摇头。{/n}“你甚至不知道她遇到了什么事情，是吗？我猜，就算让你知道些，应该也无妨吧……”{n}古怪的声音传来，艾米莉娜陷入沉默之中，转身看着隧道……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina shakes her head.{/n} "You don't even know what fate befell her, do you? I suppose it won't hurt for you to know something of it..." {n}A strange sound causes the Sage to fall silent. She turns toward the tunnel...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}艾米莉娜摇了摇头。{/n}“你甚至不知道她遇到了什么事情，是吗？我猜，就算让你知道些，应该也无妨吧……”{n}古怪的声音传来，艾米莉娜陷入沉默之中，转身走向了隧道……{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Ni siquiera sabe qué fue de ella, ¿no? Supongo que no pasará nada por compartir algo de información sobre el tema...». {n}Un sonido extraño hace enmudecer a la sabia. Se gira hacia el túnel...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina shakes her head.{/n} "You don't even know what fate befell her, do you? I suppose it won't hurt for you to know something of it..." {n}A strange sound causes the Sage to fall silent. She turns toward the tunnel...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Ni siquiera sabe qué fue de ella, ¿no? Supongo que no pasará nada por compartir algo de información sobre el tema...». {n}Un sonido extraño hace enmudecer a la sabia. Se gira hacia el túnel...{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}エメリナは首を横に振る。{/n}「彼女にどんな運命が降りかかったのかなど、知りませんよね？多少は知っていても損はないと思いますが…」{n}奇妙な音がしたことで、賢者は沈黙する。彼女はトンネルの方を向いた…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina shakes her head.{/n} "You don't even know what fate befell her, do you? I suppose it won't hurt for you to know something of it..." {n}A strange sound causes the Sage to fall silent. She turns toward the tunnel...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エメリナは首を横に振る。{/n}「彼女にどんな運命が降りかかったのかなど、知りませんよね？多少は知っていても損はないと思いますが…」{n}奇妙な音がしたことで、賢者は沈黙する。彼女はトンネルの方を向いた…{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina secoue la tête.{/n} « Vous ne savez même pas ce qui lui est arrivé, je me trompe ? Je ne pense pas risquer grand-chose en vous révélant quelques informations... » {n}Un bruit étrange fait taire la sage. Elle se tourne vers le tunnel...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina shakes her head.{/n} "You don't even know what fate befell her, do you? I suppose it won't hurt for you to know something of it..." {n}A strange sound causes the Sage to fall silent. She turns toward the tunnel...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina secoue la tête.{/n} « Vous ne savez même pas ce qui lui est arrivé, je me trompe ? Je ne pense pas risquer grand-chose en vous révélant quelques informations... » {n}Un bruit étrange fait taire la sage. Elle se tourne vers le tunnel...{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ihr wisst nicht einmal, welches Schicksal sie ereilt hat, richtig? Wahrscheinlich schadet es nicht, wenn Ihr einen Teil davon erfahrt ..." {n}Ein merkwürdiges Geräusch lässt die Weise verstummen. Sie dreht sich zu dem Tunnel um ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina shakes her head.{/n} "You don't even know what fate befell her, do you? I suppose it won't hurt for you to know something of it..." {n}A strange sound causes the Sage to fall silent. She turns toward the tunnel...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Ihr wisst nicht einmal, welches Schicksal sie ereilt hat, richtig? Wahrscheinlich schadet es nicht, wenn Ihr einen Teil davon erfahrt ..." {n}Ein merkwürdiges Geräusch lässt die Weise verstummen. Sie dreht sich zu dem Tunnel um ...{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: {n}Emelina başını sallıyor.{/n} "Başına gelenden haberin bile yok, değil mi? Öğrenmenin zararı dokunmayacaktır..." {n}Tuhaf bir ses, Âlim'in sessizliğe gömülmesine neden oluyor. Tünelden tarafa dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Emelina shakes her head.{/n} "You don't even know what fate befell her, do you? I suppose it won't hurt for you to know something of it..." {n}A strange sound causes the Sage to fall silent. She turns toward the tunnel...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Emelina başını sallıyor.{/n} "Başına ne geldiğinden haberin bile yok, değil mi? Sanırım bir şeyleri öğrenmenden zarar gelmez..." {n}Tuhaf bir ses, Âlim'in sessizliğe gömülmesine neden oluyor. Tünele doğru koşmaya başlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
